title: Hisense’s super-bright 85-inch QLED TV is ready to take on OLED TVs

description: The goal was to stabilize the business in what was otherwise a very turbulent year.

description: In a recent interview, Shuhei Yoshida explained that he wants the PS5 to become a more inviting space for smaller games.
